984130.name: Robbie Swifthand and the Orb of Mysteries - OST
984130.description:
Robbie Swifthand and the Orb of Mysteries Official Soundtrack


The Robbie Swifthand and the Orb of Mysteries Soundtrack features over 60 minutes of music composed exclusively for the game. The soundtrack was composed by Vicky Fysika, with guest performances from soprano Vassia Zacharopoulou, guitarist Yiannis Katsaros and cretan lutanist George Konstantakis. The soundtrack is mixed and mastered by Yiannis Katsaros.

List of music tracks


  • 01. Drums of Destiny
  • 02. Robbie’s Trials
  • 03. Story of a Thief
  • 04. Temple of Despair
  • 05. Ponos (feat George Konstantakis)
  • 06. Skinner Spinner (feat George Konstantakis)
  • 07. Stonehead
  • 08. Lil Spirit’s Epiphany
  • 09. Layla and the Secrets
  • 10. Gardens of Danger
  • 11. Lights of Senkra
  • 12. Mystic Woods
  • 13. Orbind
  • 14. Siren’s Call (feat Vassia Zacharopoulou)
  • 15. Lady in Blue (feat Vassia Zacharopoulou)
  • 16. Finding the True Hero
  • 17. Red Is The New Black (feat Yiannis Katsaros)
  • 18. Lost in the Sacred Stones
  • 19. Lava is Not your Field (feat Yiannis Katsaros)
  • 20. Tatte Onas
  • 21. Ghost Guardian (feat Yiannis Katsaros)
  • 22. Vil Ritma
  • 23. Orb of Mysteries

Mp3 320 kbps
